column2: This test case verifies that a user can successfully log in using valid credentials and is redirected to the appropriate role-based dashboard
User has valid credentials. Application running at http://localhost:3000/login. Database and server operational.

column4: Login page loads with email and password fields

column2: User logged in and authenticated. Session active. User on role-specific dashboard.

column3: Verify Login Fails with Invalid Email

column2: Verify system handles login attempts with invalid email and displays appropriate error messages
User has access to login page. Invalid email prepared for testing.
User not authenticated. Remains on login page. No session created. Error message displayed.

column3: Verify Login Fails with Invalid Password

column2: Verify system handles login attempts with incorrect passwords for valid email addresses
Valid email exists in system. Incorrect password used for testing.

column4: System doesn't reveal if email or password was wrong

column2: User not authenticated. Remains on login page. Generic error displayed.

column3: Verify Login Form Validation with Empty Fields

User on login page with empty form fields

column4: Login page loads with empty fields
Submission prevented; user on login page

column2: Validation prevents submission. Error messages displayed. No API call made.
